ModMetaData.name: DDA Security and More (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of James76543s mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1356331773 with the turrets from the original mod from DaemonDeathAngel https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=892434137
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/DDASecurityAndMore
--- James76543s Description --- I love the walls from this mod, so I updated it to V1.0 version. I left out the turrets (couldn't figure out how to update them, and I feel that More Vanilla Turrets handles this a lot more nicely anyway).
7/28/2019 I changed the recipe (to require some chemfuel) and changed balance around a little so reinforced walls are slightly less expensive that four regular walls back to back, but at the cost of greater work.
For V1.0, I made some changes to be aware of. I removed the coolers and heaters, I modified some minor settings for the walls, and I remove the custom workshop table completed. You can now make reinforced plates from the smelter, no need for an extra workshop table! I also added embrasures that are stronger than normal and have a custom texture.
--- Original Description --- Hey, Onesan, lets mine through this idiots puny wall and lay waste to everyone and everything within!
Added Content
Re-Inforced Walls | Requires Steel Plates Blast Door | Requires Steel Plates Re-Inforced Manned Shotgun Turret | Requires Steel Plates Re-Inforced Manned Sniper Turret | Requires Steel Plates Re-Inforced Manned Gattling Turret | Requires Steel Plates Barbed Wire | Does Not Require Plates Fences | Does Not Require Plates
Known Issues
Currently No Known Mod Conflicts
Update Error: With the recent update, I broke some peoples saves by changing def names, if you are recieving errors about missing def names, just place down a new metal working table and remove the old one, that should fix your errors on save and reload. If you had wood re-inforced walls, you will have to create a new game in order to use the mod, as wooden reinforced walls were removed, and will cause saves to fail.
Report a conflict in the "Bug Report" Thread.
